name: Emulation Corner
subtitle: A source for a bunch of popular emulators.
description: Welcome to Emulation Corner! Here you'll find a bunch of popular emulators such as Folium, MeloNX and DolphiniOS. JIT is not required, but recommended. An option for JIT can be AltJIT or using StickDebug from the App Store.

apps.name: UTM SE
apps.subtitle: Virtual machines for iOS (with JIT support)
apps.localizedDescription:
UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad. This version runs on all iOS 14+ devices but lacks JIT support and is all slower than regular UTM.


More information at https://getutm.app/

Features:

Emulate any Processor
30+ processors supported by qemu including x86_64, ARM64, and RISC-V
Run any Operating System
Windows, Linux, and more natively and securely on iOS within an App
Fast Emulation
Para-virtualization with SPICE and JIT compilation with TCG
High Compatibility
iOS 11+ supported. Works on iPhone and iPad. No jailbreak needed for iOS 11-13
Free and Open Source
UTM and its dependencies are all free and open source
Easy to Use
Configure and customize your VM in a native UI

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: The virtual machine may access the local network. UTM may also use the network to communicate with local servers.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Permission is required for any virtual machine to record from the microphone.

apps.name: UTM
apps.subtitle: Virtual machines for iOS (with JIT support)
apps.localizedDescription:
UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad. This version requires using AltJIT. Install UTM SE for slower emulation without JIT.


More information at https://getutm.app/

Features:

Emulate any Processor
30+ processors supported by qemu including x86_64, ARM64, and RISC-V
Run any Operating System
Windows, Linux, and more natively and securely on iOS within an App
Fast Emulation
Para-virtualization with SPICE and JIT compilation with TCG
High Compatibility
iOS 11+ supported. Works on iPhone and iPad. No jailbreak needed for iOS 11-13
Free and Open Source
UTM and its dependencies are all free and open source
Easy to Use
Configure and customize your VM in a native UI

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: The virtual machine may access the local network. UTM may also use the network to communicate with local servers.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Permission is required for any virtual machine to record from the microphone.

apps.name: DolphiniOS
apps.subtitle: Dolphin, now on iOS!
apps.localizedDescription: DolphiniOS is a GameCube and Wii emulator for iOS and iPadOS. All iOS versions starting with 14.0 are supported, and no jailbreak is required!

privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: DolphiniOS uses your device's accelerometer and gyroscope to emulate the Wii Remote's built-in accelerometer and gyroscope.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: DolphiniOS uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer.

apps.name: DolphiniOS Beta
apps.subtitle: Dolphin, now on iOS!
apps.localizedDescription: DolphiniOS is a GameCube and Wii emulator for iOS and iPadOS. All iOS versions starting with 14.0 are supported, and no jailbreak is required!

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: DolphiniOS uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer.

apps.name: MAME4iOS
apps.localizedDescription: Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator for iOS, iPadOS, tvOS, macOS (Catalyst)

versions.localizedDescription:
Updated to MAME 250.
tvOS UX: use a Alert instead of a inline Segmented Control.
Show upload feedback in Web Server UX.
Added Make First Favorite to game context menu.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: We need bluetooth for steam controllers

apps.name: MeloNX
apps.subtitle: The most advanced NX emulator for iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

versions.localizedDescription:
What's New

UE Games: Fixes the bug in the last release that causes Unreal Engine games to show a black screen or have colour issues.
Virtual Controller Button: Fixes bug where buttons don't properly register clicks.
Launch Crash: Fixes the bug where the app crashes on any game launch with System.PlatformNotSupportedException
Fix TimeZones: Fixes the bug where time in-games aren't reflected properly

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: MeloNX needs access to your Photo Library in order to save images

news.title: Emulation Corner first release!
news.caption: Emulation corner has been released. Some of its featured apps include Folium, MeloNX and DolphiniOS!
